long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get rid of huge Amazon links by shortening them with this simple extension.

By clicking on the extension icon a small pop-up will be opened in which you can shorten the link of the Amazon product on which page you are. Additionally you can copy the shortened link to your clipboard.

It also features an options page on which you can customize your preferences.

Supports HTTP & HTTPS and all Amazon domains (amazon.com, amazon.de, ...).

This extension is an open-source project. Check out the source code at: https://github.com/lfeigl/amazon-link-shortener
